Title: Requires the commissioner of taxation and finance to conduct a study on the earned income tax credit and to propose changes thereto
Summary: Relates to requiring the commissioner of taxation and finance in conjunction with the health department and the office of temporary and disability assistance to conduct a study on the earned income tax credit and to propose changes thereto.
ActClause: AN ACT requiring the commissioner of taxation and finance in conjunction with the department of health and the office of temporary and disability assistance to conduct a study on the earned income tax credit and to describe changes thereto
